verses.content: Chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a.
“Mihriem naupa, grêphrui kûng, grêp hrui kâu ramhnuoi thing laia um ve bawk chu, thing dang nêkin ieng am a danglam bikna?
Sin ieng ang khawm thawna dingin chutaka inthawk chun thing lâk suok thei a ni ding am a nih? Annawleh, mihaiin bûr le bêl, khaina dingin a kâute an lâk ding am a nih?
Ngai ta, thing tiha hmang dingin meia peilût a nih, a hmawr ve ve chu mei chun a kâng hmang a, a lai chu a hung kâng a; sin ieng ding khawma a ṭhahnem am a nih?
Ngai ta, a pumpuia a um lai khawma ieng sina ding khawma a tlâktlai naw a, meiin a kâng hmang zo hnung lem chun a va tlâktlai naw nasa âwmin, a kâng hnung chun sin ieng dingin am tlâktlai tâng a ta!
Chuleiin, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Grêphrui thing chu ramhnuoia thing danghai laia meia ti dinga ka pêk angin; chuong ang bawk chun Jerusalem hluotuhai chu pêng ka tih.

An chunga chun ka hmai innghat ka ta; meia inthawk chun fe suok sienkhawm mei bawkin anni chu kânghmang a tih; chun, chuonga anni chu ka hmai kân nghat pha chun LALPA chu ka nih ti mi hre tâng an tih.
Chun, bawsietna thil chu an thaw leiin, ram chu râusanah siem ka tih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.
